article.title: Status and history for ell_monotonic
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Ό and Ἐ were incorrectly reprenseted using U+0027 ' APOSTROPHE for the diacritic. Thanks to lemzwerg and Sascha Brawer for reporting this.
in article 23, à ανεργεία” corrected to “ανεργία” (thanks to Yannis Haralambous).
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
